description: This file contains a test case class for running and verifying SystemTap scripts within an embedded Linux build environment, utilizing the oeqa testing framework. It defines a specific test 'test_stap' that runs commands related to kernel scripting and checks their output.

classes.name: StapTest
classes.description: A test case class extending OERuntimeTestCase, designed to verify SystemTap scripts execution in a build environment.

methods.name: test_stap(self)
methods.description: Runs a series of commands to compile kernel scripts, execute a SystemTap script, and verify output; includes error handling and log printing if test fails.
